name: Popeye (itch)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.1 (beta) Details Title Popeye Model No. PP-23 Series Game & Watch (Widescreen) Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date August 5, 1981 Chipset Sharp SM5A ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

In this widescreen edition of Nintendo's Game & Watch series Popeye and Olive are getting ready to take a boat trip. Popeye has to catch the food Olive throws to him to load into their boat while he dodges Brutus' attacks.

Gameplay

Use the LEFT and RIGHT buttons to position Popeye to catch the items of food Olive throws towards the boat. Food items not caught lands in the water. You'll score 1 miss for every 2 items that ends up in the water. Brutus will try to knock Popeye out of the boat. Get knocked out by Brutus and you'll score 1 miss. Score 3 misses and the game is over.

Controls Keyboard Left A or Left Arrow Right D or Right Arrow Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel Resources Audio Koby Goldberg ( madrgialdesign.it ) Box Art Nintandbox ( nintandbox.net ) Instructions Torsten Lindh ( intheattic.co.uk ) Textures Lee Robson ( progettosnaps.net )
